actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction equal to 130 percent of the amount actually paid or incurred for natural gas used on a farm for farming purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax deduction equal to 130 percent of the cost of natural gas used on a farm for farming purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction equal to 130 percent of the amount actually paid or incurred for natural gas used on a farm for farming purposes.
